mapper.insert: insert into board_notice(id, board_type, title, body, images_url, created_at, modified_at) values (null, #{boardType}, #{title}, #{body}, #{imagesUrl}, NOW(), null)
mapper.update: update board_notice set title = #{title}, body = #{body}, images_url = #{imagesUrl}, modified_at = NOW()
mapper.select: select id, title, images_url, created_at from board_notice order by created_at desc
